text:
Also, for ActionStyle:
1. Is `legal_action_space` the action set at the present timestep?
2. What is `legal_action_space_mask`?

elements.text: Is `legal_action_space` the action set at the present timestep?

text:
This is a common question. So I answered it here:

<https://juliareinforcementlearning.org/guide/#what_are_legal_action_space_and_legal_action_space_mask>

elements.text: This is a common question. So I answered it here:

text:
Thanks but is this correct? Seems like "action" appears twice after "do":


RLBase.legal_action_space_mask(env::YourEnv) = map(action_space(env)) do action
    action in legal_action_space(env)
end

elements.text: Thanks but is this correct? Seems like "action" appears twice after "do":

RLBase.legal_action_space_mask(env::YourEnv) = map(action_space(env)) do action
    action in legal_action_space(env)
end

text: The first `action` is the argument name of the lambda function created by `do` block.
